item.title: Competitive Programming - How do I Start ?
item.description: A lot of enthusiastic beginners are often intimidated by the huge amount of topics in CP and the amount of OJâ€™s on the web. As a result, due to lack of guidance they are let down ,take up inefficient learning methods and end up getting frustrated. This article aims to guide beginners on how to start your journey into the world of competitive programming. These are the brief areas I wish to cover in this article:
